titles.title: Sweet Honey In The Rock; Sweet Honey In The Rock

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Sweet honey in the Rock; sweet honey in the Rock
Just like sweet honey in the Rock.
Come taste and see what the Lord has done
For it's just like sweet honey in the Rock.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
I heard the voice of Jesus say, Come unto me and rest.
Lie down, lie down, O weary one, your head upon my breast.
I came to Jesus just as I was; I was weary, worn, and sad.
I found in Him a resting place, and He has made me glad.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Amazing grace, how sweet the sound
That saved a wretch like me.
I found in Him a higher ground,
And He has made me glad.
